title: The Time Merchants and Other Strange Tales
description: This set of thirty powerful short stories takes the readers on a journey from the absurd to the sublimely sensitive, from the mundane to the esoteric and from the depths of extreme sorrow to the heights of humour. It explores the boundaries of imagination and holds the attention of readers with unusual storylines, tight and subtle language and a unique narrative style.Read a story a day from this collection. Liberate yourself
author: Vasudev Murthy
